name: Mission Moon Bound
description:
Our game will be a space station on the moon that will simulate what it could be like to live on the moon. Players will have to understand what it's like to avoid health conditions that could arise from living in a place with such lack of gravity, conditions such as osteoporosis due to lack of physical motion because of the lack of gravity. Players will have to do repairs to fix issues that could arise from living in a place as perilous as the moon and do routine maintenance.

Team

Jonathan Ramos - Team Lead/Programmer

Jeremy Pineda -Programmer
